text: I've tried to order from this restaurant twice through Just-Eat.ca  The first time they were closed but had not informed Just-Eat.ca. The second time we placed an order they said they were 'too busy' and cancelled our order.  Fuck you Mexicano Grill. Fuck you.
Great food, hot service, and authentic atmosphere. Not fancy, but full of flavor, and big portions!
Great authentic Mexican food.  Awesome tacos and burritos and very nice staff.  Definitely worth a try.
